DOC.brief_summary: The overall objective compare short-term ( 3 month ) effectiveness three glucose-lowering intervention ( dapagliflozin , metformin physical activity ) glucose variability , body composition , cardiometabolic risk factor overweight obese individual pre-diabetes ( HbA1c 5.7-6.4 % / 39-47 mmol/mol ) .
DOC.brief_title: The PRE-D Trial : Effect Dapagliflozin , Metformin Physical Activity Pre-diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: Different medical therapy lifestyle modification prevention type 2 diabetes yet compare head-to-head individual pre-diabetes . This research project compare different glucose-lowering intervention overweight obese individual HbA1c level pre-diabetic range .
DOC.criteria: HbA1c : ≥5.7 % ( 39 mmol/mol ) ≤6.4 % ( 47 mmol/mol ) Age : ≥30 ≤70 year age BMI ≥25 kg/m2 Uncontrolled medical issue include limited cardiovascular pulmonary , rheumatologic , hematologic , oncologic , infectious , gastrointestinal psychiatric disease ; diabetes endocrine disease ; immunosuppression ; Current treatment hormone affect glucose metabolism ; Current treatment loop diuretic thiazolidinediones ; Current treatment beta blocker peroral steroid ; Bariatric surgery within past 2 year ; Impaired renal function define estimate GFR < 60 ml/min/1.73m2 ; Neurogenic bladder disorder ; Alcohol/drug abuse treatment disulfiram ( Antabus ) time inclusion ; Pregnant lactate woman ; Fertile woman use birth control agent include oral contraceptive , gestagen injection , subdermal implant , hormonal vaginal ring , transdermal application , intrauterine device ; Allergic one medication use study ; Concomitant participation intervention study ; Unable understand inform consent study procedure .
